content: Is anyone aware of any mappings available from X12 to FHIR? We are looking at how to map the X12 835 to FHIR resources, specifically the DFI number, without having context of the payment information.
@Paul Knapp @MaryKay McDaniel

@Julia Sutula @MaryKay McDaniel The Financial Management (FM) work group has been working with X12 to establish a process for creating a formal mapping between X12 transaction and FHIR resources this work has not been done and even if done X12 rather than HL7 would be responsible for managing the release of such mappings given that their IP is controlled by them.
If you could join the FM committee on one of our calls (Tuesday 11AM eastern, https://join.freeconferencecall.com/fm4) we could probably address this and follow-on questions there.
